description: This file sets up an agent with specific tools and a model, then requests a report comparing two stocks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured with a model, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: xAI
classes.description: A model class with an identifier and reasoning effort level.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for fetching financial data such as stock prices, recommendations, and news.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent, possibly streaming the output.
